name: Shoot the Zombies: Beach day
description:
This is Lore-packed!!! The Final (mabye) installment of the shoot the zombies series!!! Featuring: 2 endings and LORE!!!

How to get endings:

Good/canon ending: Must shoot 100 zombies before the 5 minute mark!!! (if you do it before the 5 minute mark, wait till the 5 minute mark hits!!!)

Bad ending: Fail to get the good ending!!!
